name: Binary Distortion
description:
Binary Distortion is a glitch trash kinetic/visual novel exploring gender and transgender issues / themes. It was made by @RiotJayne in Ren'Py for the #NaNoReno2015.

Art / Photographs / Screen Caps and SFX mostly sourced online and used without permission. Music used with permission by hearken (@h34rken) off Somewhere, Someday (2014) and DP / DR (2015).

Click here to buy the full albums in high-quality FLAC and MP3.

50% of the money raised during 2015 was donated to Camp Aranutiq. Continued support goes to the creator.
